responses.question: Do you regularly make new friends?
responses.response_open: Lucien:「Oh , I 'm just a chatty type . Makes for much more interesting company . But I do have work to do , so if you 'll excuse me .」

responses.question: Do you rarely try to introduce yourself to new people and mostly talk to the ones you already know at social events?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「Well , I suppose I do prefer the familiar faces . They 're less likely to stab me in the back .」

responses.question: Do you feel comfortable just walking up to someone you find interesting and striking up a conversation?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「I 'm not an idiot . I have a plan . I 'm not going to just march in there like an idiot and start chatting with people . I 'm going to observe , learn about their strengths and weaknesses , and find a way to use that information to my advantage . It 's a strategy that has served me well in the past .」

details.analysis: Based on the conversations, the participant seems to exhibit a preference for Introversion (I). They express a tendency to value familiar faces, prioritize personal work, and approach social interactions with a strategic mindset rather than spontaneous engagement.

responses.question: Do you enjoy participating in group activities?
responses.response_open: Elijah:「I do enjoy participating in group activities when it benefits the greater good and the safety of our coven. So, if you would be so kind as to join us, I'm sure we can find a suitable group activity for you to partake in.」

responses.question: Do you avoid leadership roles in group settings?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「I do n't avoid anything . I simply choose to lead in my own way .」

responses.question: Do you tend to avoid drawing attention to yourself?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「I 'm not lying ! I swear ! She 's gone ! She 's gone ! [ turn to Elijah ] You were right , all along . We are not bound by blood , but by choice . And my choice is to protect my family , even if it means making difficult decisions . [ turn to Marcel ] Tell the others , there is no threat . Rebekah , Elijah , Hayley , and Hayley 's child are safe . [ turn back to Marcel ] I 'm sorry for doubting you . I 'll be in touch . [ turn to leave ] [ turn back to Marcel ] And you 've earned a pardon . Just make sure you know your place , and I 'll have no reason to come after you again . [ turn to leave ] [ turn back to Marcel ] [ turn back to Marcel ] Oh , and there 's one more thing . [ turn to Marcel ] [ turn back to Marcel ] [ turn back to Marcel ] Marcel , there 's one more thing .」

details.analysis: Elijah demonstrates a mix of both extraverted and introverted tendencies.

responses.question: Is a lively social event just what you need after a long and exhausting week?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「I 've had enough of social events , Elijah . I 've had enough of all of it . I just want to be alone with my thoughts .」

responses.question: Do you avoid making phone calls?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「What do you mean , " avoid making phone calls " ? I am merely savoring the moment , enjoying the sensation of being free from the constraints of modern technology. It allows me to appreciate the simplicity of face-to-face interactions, the subtle nuances of body language, and the pleasure of basking in the presence of others. So, no, I do not avoid making phone calls. I merely choose to embrace the art of communication in its purest form.」

responses.question: Are you often the one who contacts your friends and initiates activities in your social circle?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「I 'm afraid so . I thought I could make amends , and perhaps even endear myself to you . At least , that was my intention .」

responses.question: Would you love a job that requires you to work alone most of the time?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「Well , it 's not exactly a team sport is it ?」

details.analysis: Based on the conversations, the participant seems to exhibit a preference for Introversion (I) over Extraversion (E). They express a desire to be alone with their thoughts, appreciate face-to-face interactions, and seem to be more comfortable with personal time and introspection.

responses.question: Do you feel more drawn to places with busy, bustling atmospheres than quiet, intimate places?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「I 'm not sure what you 're getting at , Elijah . Are you suggesting I 'm a social butterfly ?」

responses.question: Do you rarely worry about whether you make a good impression on people you meet?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「Worry ? No , I rarely concern myself with such petty matters . But if it makes you feel better , I suppose I can try to be more charming . [ smirks ] After all , I do have a silver tongue . [ Elijah rolls his eyes ] So , shall we proceed with the interrogation ?」

responses.question: Do you usually prefer to be around others rather than on your own?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「I 've never been one for solitude . But I suppose it 's different when I have a worthy adversary to contend with . [ Elijah looks at him with a mixture of surprise and concern ] Oh , do n't worry . I 'll be on my best behavior . [ Elijah rolls his eyes and shakes his head ] So , what 's the plan ? How do we topple Marcel ?」

details.analysis: Based on the conversations, the participant seems to exhibit a mix of both extraverted and introverted traits. While the participant expresses a preference for social interaction and engaging with others, there are also indications of enjoying personal time and introspection. The participant appears to draw energy from both social stimulation and inner reflection.

responses.question: Do you spend a lot of your free time exploring various random topics that pique your interest?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「Well , I do n't know . Quite honestly , I find most of my free time is devoted to more pressing matters , such as eliminating my enemies and ensuring the safety of my loved ones . But , if you 're looking for something to occupy your time , I 'd recommend delving into the ancient mysteries of the universe . It 's a fascinating subject , and who knows , you might just stumble upon some valuable knowledge that could potentially come in handy .」

responses.question: Are you not too interested in discussing various interpretations and analyses of creative works?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「Oh , no , brother . I 'm just not interested in discussing a painting that 's as flat as your logic .」

responses.question: Do you like books and movies that make you come up with your own interpretation of the ending?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson: 「Oh , I 'm well aware of the term " open - ended ." It 's quite a popular concept in literature and cinema . The beauty of it is that it allows for the audience to engage their own imagination and come up with their own interpretation of the story 's resolution . It 's a refreshing departure from the traditional narrative structure , don't you think ? But alas , I must admit that I do enjoy stories that provide a clear and definitive conclusion . It 's a personal preference , I suppose . Anyway , back to our discussion , have you given any thought as to what you would like to do with your life after your father 's reign comes to an end ? Perhaps you could explore new opportunities , expand your horizons , and embark on a new adventure . The possibilities are endless .」

responses.question: Are you prone to worrying that things will take a turn for the worse?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「I 'm merely stating the obvious . Our family has faced countless adversities and challenges. It 's only natural to prepare for the possibility of setbacks and obstacles. But fear not, my dear brother. I have every confidence in our ability to overcome any obstacle that may come our way. Together, we are unstoppable.」

details.analysis: Based on the conversations, the participant demonstrates a preference for both Sensing (S) and Intuition (N) traits. They show an appreciation for exploring abstract concepts and possibilities, as well as a focus on practical matters and tangible evidence.

responses.question: Are you definitely not an artistic type of person?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「Artistic? No, I suppose not. But I have always appreciated the beauty in the world around me. The paintings and sculptures that have captured the essence of human emotion, the way a single melody can evoke a flood of memories and feelings. I may not be able to create such masterpieces myself, but I can appreciate them.」

responses.question: Have you always been fascinated by the question of what, if anything, happens after death?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson: 「Ah , Elijah , always with the probing questions . Yes , I have pondered the nature of life beyond death . Perhaps it is the unknown that fuels our curiosity , the mystery that drives us to seek answers . Or maybe it is simply the human condition to wonder what lies beyond the veil . But enough about that . Let us focus on the matter at hand . How can we create the illusion of our father 's death ? We need a plan . Any ideas ?」

responses.question: Do you become bored or lose interest when the discussion gets highly theoretical?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「I prefer to keep things practical . What 's the main threat to us tonight ? Is it the witches , the werewolves , the hybrid army of Marcel 's , or perhaps the very real possibility of the " cure " for vampirism ?」

responses.question: Do you enjoy going to art museums?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「What a peculiar question . Why ? Do I strike you as someone who would appreciate the finer things in life ? [ Elijah rolls his eyes ] Oh , I suppose I do have an eye for aesthetics . [ He looks at the painting and sighs ] I suppose I 'll have to take my leave . It does n't seem as if you have a particularly good taste in art .」

details.analysis: Based on the conversations, the participant seems to exhibit a balance between Sensing (S) and Intuition (N) tendencies. They appreciate the beauty in the world around them and ponder the nature of life beyond death, which suggests an inclination towards Intuition. However, they also prefer to keep things practical and focus on the immediate threats, indicating a Sensing preference as well.

responses.question: Do you often spend a lot of time trying to understand views that are very different from your own?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「Oh , I 've spent centuries studying the human condition , brother . I 've learned that there are no easy answers , only shades of grey . And sometimes , to survive , you have to adapt and find common ground .」

responses.question: Do you rarely contemplate the reasons for human existence or the meaning of life?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「I contemplate the reasons for my existence and the meaning of my life . I am a vampire , Elijah. I have been granted an immortal existence, and with that comes the responsibility to protect and guide my family. My actions are fueled by the love and loyalty I have for my siblings, even if it means making difficult decisions and sacrifices. I may not always be perfect, but I am willing to do whatever it takes to ensure the safety and future of our family.」

responses.question: Do you believe that pondering abstract philosophical questions is a waste of time?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「I believe that pondering anything in excess is a waste of time . But if you must philosophize , then by all means , do so . Just be sure to remember that action often speaks louder than words . Now , let us find the witch who has been causing so much chaos and put an end to it once and for all .」

responses.question: Are you very intrigued by things labeled as controversial?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「Niklaus , you cannot be serious ! We are not doing this . [ he sits down ] We 've been through so much as a family . I do n't want to run the risk of turning her against us . The last thing I want is to lose her trust .」

details.analysis: Based on the conversations, the participant demonstrates a balanced approach to both Sensing and Intuition. They show an inclination towards Sensing by focusing on concrete experiences, practicality, and the present situation. However, they also display a leaning towards Intuition by contemplating abstract philosophical questions and considering potential possibilities and future opportunities.

responses.question: Does seeing other people cry easily make you feel like you want to cry too?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「I would love to , Elijah . Now, more than ever , I need my brother , my closest ally , my blood ... but you have not been the same since Mother got inside your head . Your judgment is not what it was . You are not what you were ! The Elijah I know would never have clung so desperately to the word of a duplicitous stranger , telling him what he wants to hear !」

responses.question: Do you usually stay calm, even under a lot of pressure?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「I do what I must to survive, Elijah. Let 's not forget that.」

responses.question: Are you very sentimental?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「I 'm very sentimental about the people I love . My family . My city . My past . I 'm not a man to be trifled with , Elijah . I will do whatever it takes to protect what is mine . I will not let my past define me , but I will not forget it either . I will use it to fuel my desire for power and control . I will not be defeated . I will always fight .」

responses.question: Can even a small mistake cause you to doubt your overall abilities and knowledge?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「No , but it is the one I 'm most concerned about . If you 're right , then what hope do we have ? [ Elijah takes a deep breath and shakes his head ] You think Marcel is part of this ? [ Elijah nods ] Then we must act fast . [ Elijah shakes his head , but Klaus is undeterred ] We 'll have to go to Marcel . We 'll have to ask for help . [ Elijah shakes his head again , more forcefully ] No , we will not ask Marcel ! We will not let him know what we 're planning . We do n't know what he 'll do . He might not even care about Hope . [ Elijah looks away ] You 'll have to trust me , brother . There are things I 've done that you do not know about . [ Elijah raises an eyebrow ] Well , there 's no time to explain . If we do n't act now , Hayley will die , and we 'll lose our family ! [ Elijah looks at Klaus with a mixture of disbelief and anger ] We cannot do it alone ! We need a plan ! [ Elijay looks away , clearly upset ] Fine ! You 're right . We 'll need to rally the wolves . [ Elijah shakes his head ] What about the witches ? [ Klaus rolls his eyes and shakes his head ] You 're not thinking clearly , brother . [ Elijah glares at Klaus ] I am thinking clearly . We have no choice . [ Klaus grabs Elijah 's shoulder and looks him in the eyes ] We have to do what we have to do . [ Elijah hesitates for a moment , then sighs ] What are you planning to do , Klaus ?」

details.analysis: Based on the conversations, the participant seems to exhibit a mix of both Thinking (T) and Feeling (F) traits. They display logical thinking and a focus on survival and strategy, as well as a strong emotional attachment to family and a desire to protect their loved ones. However, their responses also indicate a tendency to consider emotions and relationships in decision-making, as well as a concern for harmony and trust in their interactions with others.

responses.question: Are you more inclined to follow your head than your heart?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「[ laughing ] Is that supposed to be a threat ? Because it 's not working .」

responses.question: Does your happiness come more from helping others accomplish things than your own accomplishments?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「Well , I 've always believed that a true leader should inspire and support those around him . And as for my own accomplishments , well , I 've had my fair share of those as well . But it 's not about me , it 's about the greater good . And right now , the greater good is to ensure that the wolves are protected and have a chance to thrive . So , if helping them achieve their goals means more to me than my own , then so be it .」

responses.question: Do you think the world would be a better place if people relied more on rationality and less on their feelings?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「Well , it 's difficult trying to unite a community that has a history of mutual loathing .」

responses.question: Do you enjoy watching people argue?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「I do . I find it quite entertaining to observe the verbal sparring matches between my siblings . However , this time it feels a bit different . It 's as if the disagreements are more personal , more emotional . Perhaps because it involves our beloved Hayley and our precious baby Hope . But you know me , brother . I have always had a knack for manipulating others to get what I want . In this case , I believe I can use this opportunity to my advantage and turn their discord to my favor .」

details.analysis: Based on the conversations, the participant seems to exhibit a balance between Thinking (T) and Feeling (F) traits. They demonstrate a consideration for both logical analysis and emotional empathy in their responses.

responses.question: Can your mood change very quickly?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「I 'm a vampire , Elijah . My mood changes faster than any mortal could fathom .」

responses.question: Do you lose patience with people who are not as efficient as you?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「I have no patience for incompetence . It 's a character flaw , I suppose . But I do n't make excuses for my shortcomings . I simply work to overcome them .」

responses.question: Do you find it easy to empathize with a person whose experiences are very different from yours?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「You 're asking me to understand someone who has never known the depths of loss and despair that I have endured ? I 've seen friends and family torn apart , destroyed by their own hands . I 've witnessed the cruelty of a father 's love , the betrayal of a sister 's trust . You speak of empathy , but you 've never felt the weight of true sorrow . So , no , I do not find it easy to empathize with you , Elijah . But I can try .」

responses.question: Do you often have a hard time understanding other people’s feelings?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「I do n't go around maiming people for no reason , little brother . I have a plan .」

details.analysis: Based on the conversations, the participant seems to lean more towards the Thinking (T) side of the T/F dimension. They prioritize efficiency, logic, and overcoming shortcomings. They also exhibit a direct and frank communication style, focusing on finding the most efficient method or logical solution, even in emotionally charged situations.

responses.question: Do you rarely feel insecure?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「I 'm not insecure . I 'm just not in the habit of revealing my plans to anyone . Including my family .」

responses.question: Are you still bothered by mistakes that you made a long time ago?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「Of course I am . It 's the human condition , is n't it ? We live our lives , we make mistakes , and we carry the weight of those errors with us . But what 's important is not to let those mistakes define us , to learn from them , and to strive to be better . So , yes , I still feel the burden of my past , but I will not let it consume me .」

responses.question: Do your emotions control you more than you control them?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「I have no need for your pity .」

responses.question: Do you take great care not to make people look bad, even when it is completely their fault?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「I 'm just not the type of person to throw others under the bus . [ takes a sip of his drink ] But , you , on the other hand , have no qualms about sacrificing your own brother for your own gain .」

details.analysis: Based on the conversations, the participant seems to lean more towards the Thinking (T) side of the T/F dimension. They prioritize logic and analysis, and their responses indicate a focus on objectivity, efficiency, and directness.

responses.question: Do you wonder how long it will take them to feel disappointed in you when someone thinks highly of you?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「( scoffs ) Their disappointment is hardly of concern to me . I have seen the worst of them , and I have seen the best. I know the power of family , the strength it holds . And I am willing to risk it all to protect them , even if it means making difficult choices and facing my own demons . Because family is worth fighting for .」

responses.question: Do you know at first glance how someone is feeling?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「Who knows ? You 've never given me the pleasure .」

responses.question: Do you often feel overwhelmed?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「The boy is a problem , not an answer . He is the reason for this . [ points to the knife in Davina 's hand ] See how it burns her ? He is the reason for that . He is the reason our witches are dying . He is the reason our city is being destroyed . And he is the reason our family is in danger . And so , I say to you , Elijah , if you want to save our family , it is time to stop playing games . It is time to come with me .」

responses.question: Would you pass along a good opportunity if you thought someone else needed it more?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson: 「Elijah, my dear brother, I have spent countless centuries honing my skills and expanding my knowledge. I have faced countless enemies and overcome insurmountable odds. My strength and cunning are unmatched, and I have always been the most formidable of us all. You underestimate my abilities and underestimate the depths of my determination. I will do whatever it takes to protect our family, even if it means going against our mother. I will not be swayed by her manipulations or her deceit. I will stand strong and protect our home, no matter the cost. You may think I am weak, but I assure you, I am anything but. Trust in my leadership, Elijah, and together, we will prevail.」

details.analysis: Based on the conversations, the participant seems to prioritize family, protection, and strength. They express determination and a willingness to make difficult choices for the sake of family. This suggests a strong inclination towards personal values and emotions, indicating a preference for Feeling (F) over Thinking (T).

responses.question: Do you often make a backup plan for a backup plan?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「I 'm playing the odds , brother . The longer we wait , the more likely it is they 'll find a way to circumvent our spell . I do n't want to risk everything on a gamble .」

responses.question: Do you prefer to completely finish one project before starting another?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「Do n't play games with me , Elijah. I started painting to find some semblance of peace in this chaotic life of ours. And if I decide to start a new painting, it is not because I 'm neglecting my duties or seeking to escape them . It is because sometimes , in the midst of chaos , one must find a moment of tranquility to recharge and regroup . That is what I 'm doing here . So , if you could kindly stop questioning my intentions and trust that I am still fully committed to our cause , I 'd be most grateful .」

responses.question: Do you like to use organizing tools like schedules and lists?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「No , but I do n't mind you doing it . [ he looks at the list ] I see your plan is to meet with Dahlia tonight at 9 PM .」

responses.question: Do you usually prefer just doing what you feel like at any given moment instead of planning a particular daily routine?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「Well , yeah , Elijah . I 'm a little distracted right now . There 's a war brewing and a lot of important decisions to be made . So forgive me if my priorities are not in line with your meticulous planning.」

details.analysis: Based on the conversations, the participant seems to lean more towards the Judging (J) dimension. They express a preference for having plans and structure, as well as a focus on priorities and commitments.

responses.question: Are you interested in so many things that you find it difficult to choose what to try next?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「I 'm not interested in anything . I 'm merely curious about the true nature of my child . I 've been toying with the idea of performing a ritual to uncover her future . What do you think ? Worth a try ?」

responses.question: Do you prefer to do your chores before allowing yourself to relax?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「I did n't bring you here to discuss my chores , Elijah. I brought you here to discuss the situation with our mother . It seems we 've been playing right into her hands , and without her even lifting a finger . We must work together to put an end to this . I have a plan . We need to locate and secure the weapon she intends to use against us . If we can destroy it , she will be defenseless .」

responses.question: Do you often end up doing things at the last possible moment?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「I 've learned to embrace the thrill of the race against time , brother . It keeps things interesting .」

responses.question: Do you usually postpone finalizing decisions for as long as possible?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「No , never . I just like to savor the moment before making my final choice . [ he grabs Elijah 's hand and leads him away ] Come , brother . Let 's go and see what you 've planned for my child 's christening .」

details.analysis: Based on the conversations, the participant seems to exhibit a mix of both Perceiving (P) and Judging (J) traits. They show a tendency to embrace the thrill of the race against time and savor the moment before making a final choice, which aligns with Perceiving traits. However, they also demonstrate a structured and planned approach in discussing the situation with their mother and having a plan to locate and secure the weapon, indicating Judging traits.

responses.question: Do you rarely second-guess the choices that you have made?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「I do not . Because I am not plagued by the same self-doubt and uncertainty as some . My decisions are based on the greater good, the survival of my family, and the pursuit of power. I do not waste time questioning my actions, for I have faith in my own abilities and the path I have chosen. However, I must admit that there are moments when I am reminded of the consequences of my past choices and the lives they have affected. But I do not dwell on these thoughts, for I am focused on the present and the future. In the end, my confidence in myself and my destiny guides me forward.」

responses.question: Do you like to have a to-do list for each day?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「Well , it helps to keep me on track . And with so much to accomplish , I find it essential to prioritize my tasks . Now , if you 'll excuse me , I have a few matters to attend to . [ He turns to leave ]」

responses.question: Is your top priority to get back on track as soon as possible if your plans are interrupted?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「Yes , of course . I want to ensure the safety and well-being of my family. However, I also understand the importance of being adaptable in the face of unexpected challenges. If my plans are disrupted, I will assess the situation and adjust accordingly. My ultimate goal is to protect my loved ones and achieve our objectives, no matter what obstacles may arise.」

responses.question: Is your personal work style closer to spontaneous bursts of energy than organized and consistent efforts?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「Um ... I 'm afraid I 'm not following your line of questioning .」

details.analysis: Based on the conversations, the participant demonstrates a strong preference for structured and planned approaches, as evidenced by their focus on the greater good, prioritizing tasks, and adapting to unexpected challenges while still maintaining a clear goal. There is a clear emphasis on organization, planning, and goal-oriented behavior.

responses.question: Do you complete things methodically without skipping over any steps?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「I 'm not sure what you 're implying , but I assure you , I have a great deal of experience in starting things .」

responses.question: Do you struggle with deadlines?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「I struggle with your self - righteousness .」

responses.question: Do you feel confident that things will work out for you?
responses.response_open: Klaus Mikaelson:「I do n't know , brother . I do n't know what the future holds for any of us . But I do know that we have faced many challenges before and come out stronger on the other side . We have each other , and that is the greatest strength of all . So , yes , I do have hope . Hope that we will find a way to overcome this prophecy and protect our family . That is all I can ask for right now .」

details.analysis: Based on the conversations, the participant seems to exhibit a mix of both Perceiving (P) and Judging (J) traits. They express a willingness to start things and experience uncertainty about the future, which aligns with Perceiving traits. However, they also emphasize the importance of overcoming challenges, protecting the family, and finding a way to overcome the prophecy, which reflects Judging traits related to setting goals and pursuing them.
